QuestData.Title: We Need a Healer - You!
QuestData.Description:
There are too many wounded on the battlefield!
Not everyone can 'bash it and make better.' We need more healers.
You: take my device and get our wounded back on their feet!
QuestData.LogDescription: Restore $1oa Wounded Covenant Allies in Seeker's Quorum.
QuestData.RewardText:
That got them back on their feet!
Any little bit helps to keep us in the fight.
